slogan: The free and effective way to learn
alert.register.successfully.title: Account created successfully
alert.register.successfully.description: Please check your email for confirmation
form.resetpassword.title: Reset my password
form.resetpassword.emailSent: We have sent a password reset link to your email.
form.resetpassword.countdown: Please wait {{seconds}}s to resend an email
form.login.title: Welcome back
form.login.subtitle: We are so excited to see you again!
form.login.label: Account Information
form.register.title: Create an account
form.register.label.displayName.tip: You can use emoji and special characters.
form.register.placeholder.password: Your password must be more than 8 characters
form.error.displayName.tooShort: Display name must be at least 5 characters
form.error.displayName.tooLong: Display name cannot exceed more than 20 characters
form.error.username.tooShort: Username must be at least 5 characters
form.error.username.tooLong: Username cannot exceed more than 20 characters
form.error.password.tooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
form.error.password.tooLong: Password cannot exceed more than 100 characters
